name: Chaos Run
description:
You're just a soul trying to rest in peace, but you got to go through chaos first.

This project was made by me, Combowar5 and Files Not Found. 

Code was done by me.
Art was done by Combowar5

Music was done by Files Not Found

This game was made for a game jam with the theme "Chaos" and a limitation of only using the a, x, space, b, p and 8.
